body_html:
The derivative of argmax at the point 0 will then be 1.
Applying a gradient when a=b will lead to an infinite loop (we can't decide which direction to take).

tf.maximum will have the same problem. We can't find an answer with the tf.argmax or tf.max only I guess.
body_text:
The derivative of argmax at the point 0 will then be 1.
Applying a gradient when a=b will lead to an infinite loop (we can't decide which direction to take).
tf.maximum will have the same problem. We can't find an answer with the tf.argmax or tf.max only I guess.
body:
The derivative of argmax at the point 0 will then be 1.
Applying a gradient when a=b will lead to an infinite loop (we can't decide which direction to take).

tf.maximum will have the same problem. We can't find an answer with the tf.argmax or tf.max only I guess.
